error.message: Call to deprecated method strlen() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strlen() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to google_analytics.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Either remove it or update it to be compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
